greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which row n > 1 lists k such that (k^2 + k*n)/(k + 1) is an integer.
comment: Minimal value of k is 0 and maximal value of k is n - 2 for n-th row.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
program: (PARI) tabf(nn) = {for (n=2, nn, for (k=0, n, if (!((k^2 + k*n) % (k+1)), print1(k, ", "));); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 25 2015
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Oct 25 2015
